getSalesHistory

Overview

This call is used to fetch the rental history of a specific property; it uses the BSGv2â€™s GetPropertyDetail under sales history list node.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Request

  • The headers must include a valid authentication token.
Parameter Description Required
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
op Operation Yes
id Property ID Yes
Test URL MSG Agent -MSGSIT:
http://msgsit.rpdata.com/ttsvr/msgdebug?uid=TWISTUSER003&op=getSalesHistory&id=9925956&sid=2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11
